knimeNode.name: Cut a Genomic Region
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters mutations in a given genomic region

fullDescription.intro:
Filters mutations in a given genomic region.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.

invert the selection (discard items in the region)
